name: Social Upliftment and Developement for Health Actions
briefDescription: Social Upliftment and Development for Health Action (SUADHA): – Is a non – governmental organization working for last seven years on different health issues as well as social causes to  uplift of the poor and needy people. Since the poverty line in rural areas is below normal and in cities health hazards is beyond control. Though the government is framing educational and health programmes to overcome the social requirements the target do not meet satisfactorily. ‘SUADHA’ is in calculating and extents support for education, poor relief, tribal-welfare and various health care facilities.Being a Healthy person of the Community is the important social wealth. In recent times, we have seen an increase in the incidence of Cancer/Osteoporosis/ HIV
